attributes.action: Rape/sexual assault offenders should face a death penalty or life in prison.
attributes.additional_details: A lot of people are getting away with rape and sexual assault, it is becoming worse people are being silenced by these criminals and are afraid to come out with their story. Majority of these crimes are being committed by men and it is because people are not being educated about this in school. A lot of people are forgetting or don’t know what consent means and it is becoming a problem.
attributes.background: We need more serious consequences/punishments for those who commit rape/sexual assault.

rejection.details:
We understand you are concerned about sentences for rape and other sexual offences, however it's not clear whether you want those convicted of such crimes to be given a mandatory life sentence, for the death penalty to be reintroduced for such offences, or for judges to be able to pass a death sentence as a maximum punishment.

You might like to sign these petitions which call for related actions:

'Require life sentences for rape and child sexual offences': https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/596328

'Hold a referendum on whether to reinstate the death penalty': https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/602435
